products.title: Ergonomic Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: A split-design ergonomic keyboard with tactile mechanical switches for a comfortable and efficient typing experience. Features customizable RGB backlighting.

products.title: 4K Ultra-HD Webcam
products.description: Professional 4K webcam with a high-quality sensor for crystal-clear video calls and streaming. Includes AI-powered auto-framing and noise-canceling mics.

products.title: Noise-Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in sound with industry-leading noise cancellation. Features 30-hour battery life, touch controls, and a comfortable, lightweight design.

products.title: Portable SSD 1TB
products.description: Blazing-fast file transfers with read speeds up to 1,050 MB/s. A compact and durable design makes it perfect for on-the-go professionals and creators.

products.title: Smart WiFi Power Strip
products.description: Control your devices from anywhere with this smart power strip. Features 4 smart outlets, 4 USB ports, and compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant.

products.title: 32-Inch 4K IPS Monitor
products.description: Experience stunning visuals with this 32-inch 4K UHD monitor. IPS panel technology ensures accurate colors and wide viewing angles. Ideal for creative work and gaming.
